snippet.title: Arcade Longplay [050] Mortal Kombat
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.net

Played By: RickyC

First time playing the arcade version. Tried not to be cheap but kinda did in the end. Took me awhile to sort out scorpion's fatality till i practiced it.

I include all the intros but only scorpion's ending since it looked the same as the amiga versions endings which I already recorded all of. At the end i show all fatalities. -
Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
